Package hr.fer.zemris.java.hw16.jvdraw.model

Interface DrawingModel

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DrawingModelImpl

    public interface DrawingModel
    Representst the model of the application JVDraw and holds all GeometricalObject's currently active in the application.
    Author:
    Dorian Ivankovic

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void add​(GeometricalObject object)
      Adds the GeometricalObject object.
      void addDrawingModelListener​(DrawingModelListener l)
      Adds new DrawingModelListener.
      void changeOrder​(GeometricalObject object, int offset)
      Changes the order of objects in the model by shifting the object by offset positions.
      GeometricalObject getObject​(int index)
      Returns the GeometricalObject at the specified index.
      int getSize​()
      Returns the size of stored GeometricalObject's.
      void remove​(GeometricalObject object)
      Removes the specified object from the model.
      void removeDrawingModelListener​(DrawingModelListener l)
      Removes the listener from the object.

        void changeOrder​(GeometricalObject object,
                 int offset)
        Changes the order of objects in the model by shifting the object by offset positions.
        Parameters:
        object - - object to change position of
        offset - - number of places to move the object
